title: Roger Federer Says Doubles Match With Nadal Could Be His Last
description: Federer, who announced his retirement last week, hinted his final competitive tennis could come Friday alongside his longtime rival Rafael Nadal.
dc:creator: Andrew Das
media:credit: Julian Finney/Getty Images For Laver Cup
media:description: Roger Federer said one final doubles match in London this week would serve as his farewell to competitive tennis.
